title: 打开游戏闪退
author: 触碰。
txt_content: [18:30:11] [Client thread/INFO]: Setting user: Andrew_T  [18:30:15] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 2.9.4  [18:30:16] [Client thread/INFO]: Reloading ResourceManager: Default  [18:30:20] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Starting up SoundSystem...  [18:30:20] [Thread-5/INFO]: Initializing LWJGL OpenAL  [18:30:20] [Thread-5/INFO]: (The LWJGL binding of OpenAL.  For more information, see file:///C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Local\Temp\%W@GJ$ACOF(TYDYECOKVDYB.pnghttp://www.lwjgl.org)  [18:30:24] [Client thread/INFO]: Created: 1024x512 textures-atlas  [18:30:25] [Thread-5/INFO]: OpenAL initialized.  [18:30:25] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Sound engine started  # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # #  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000005db355ec, pid=12872, tid=0x00000000000020dc # # JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (8.0_121-b13) (build 1.8.0_121-b13) # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (25.121-b13 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops) # Problematic frame: # C  [ig4dev64.dll+0x55ec] # # Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\[1.9.4]Minecraft—创世神客户端の\.minecraft\hs_err_pid12872.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: #   file:///C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Local\Temp\%W@GJ$ACOF(TYDYECOKVDYB.pnghttp://bugreport.java.com/bugreport/crash.jsp # The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code. # See problematic frame for where to report the bug. # AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed

replies.author: 崔金科
replies.txt_content: 是不是配置问题，你没有详细说你玩的带不带模组，有些模组可能和配置起冲突吧

replies.author: 崔金科
replies.txt_content: 或者是你换一个java最新版和你家电脑位数相同的如果说你家电脑是32位那么java也装32位的

replies.author: 触碰。
replies.txt_content:
崔金科 发表于 2017-2-10 19:02
或者是你换一个java最新版和你家电脑位数相同的如果说你家电脑是32位那么java也装32位的 ...
不带你这么水的。。

replies.author: aiwdsj
replies.txt_content:
C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\[1.9.4]Minecraft—创世神客户端の\.minecraft\hs_err_pid12872.log
内容贴出来看看

replies.author: wu77441
replies.txt_content: 新版本，貌似需要Java8的支持。实在不行你加载纯净的那个版本试试，如果纯净版本能进，估计就是MOD的影响了。
Java换最新版本，百度下，然后内存调成512或者300，最多点两次启动游戏，还是不行就只能换端
